codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: Link Type
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this Patient resource and another Patient/RelatedPerson resource.

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

codeSystems.name: AgeRangeVS

codeSystems.description: ValueSet including selected HMIS age ranges from the PeriodRangeCS CodeSystem

codeSystems.title: Condition / Diagnosis Severity
codeSystems.description: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading

codeSystems.title: District
codeSystems.description: All district used in administrative divisions

codeSystems.description: Combined SNOMED CT, HL7 v3, and local codes for the highest level of education attained.

codeSystems.description: ValueSet for जाति कोड (Ethnic Codes in Nepal)

codeSystems.description: ValueSet for Free Cost

codeSystems.name: FreeServiceEligibilityVS

codeSystems.name: MaritalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Marital Status (वैवाहिक स्थिति)
codeSystems.description: Codes representing marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: OptionSetYesNoVS
codeSystems.title: Option Set - Yes / No / Yes-only / Don't know / Not applicable / Positive / Negative
codeSystems.description:
Master option set for Yes/No/Yes-only/Don't know/Not applicable, Positive/Negative questions, including Nepali designations:छ/छैन, 
हो/होइन, गराएको/नगराएको, लिएको/नलिएको, भएको/नभएको, पास/फेल, पाएको/नपाएको
Used for:
- Presumptive TB Case (सम्भावित क्षयरोग विरामी)
- Gender Based Violence (लैंगिक हिंसा)
- Exclusively Breastfeeding (शिशुलाइ जन्मेको ६ महिना सम्म स्तनपान मात्र गराएको)
- Complementary Food (६ महिना पछि स्तनपान साथै ठोस, अर्धठोस र नरम खाना सुरू)
- GDS Present (General Danger Sign Present)
- Chest Indrawing (Yes only)
- Stridor (Yes only)
- Wheezing (Yes only)
- Condom Use
- Lab test results (Positive/Negative)

codeSystems.name: PatientRegistrationTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Patient Registration Type
codeSystems.description: Patient registration types mapped to SNOMED CT concepts with Nepali display.

codeSystems.name: ProvinceVS
codeSystems.title: Province
codeSystems.description: All provinces used in administrative divisions

codeSystems.name: ServiceAreaAddressVS
codeSystems.title: Service Area Address Classification
codeSystems.description: Classification of address locations relative to the organization's service area and referral context, using SNOMED CT concepts to specify whether the address is inside or outside the service area and the type of location involved.

codeSystems.name: ServiceTypeVS
codeSystems.title: Service Type
codeSystems.description: Service Type

codeSystems.name: VisitOrdinalVS
codeSystems.title: Patient Visit Ordinal
codeSystems.description: ValueSet combining SNOMED CT codes for first and follow-up visits with local codes for second, third, and repeat visits.
